title: july 9: pretty in pink
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a scientific discovery about the color pink. After, she reflects on a funny Leonard Cohen moment. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
